content:
/>
V.iv.1.C.1.a
.
Definition:  Coded Conclusion
A
coded conclusion
is the section of the
Codesheet
of a rating decision which contains
a summary of information on the status of benefits, and
all decided issues.
Reference
:  For more information on generating a coded conclusion in Veterans Benefits Management System - Rating (VBMS-R), see the
VBMS-R User Guide
.
title: M21-1, Part V, Subpart iv, Chapter 1, Section C - Coded Conclusion
citation: Part V, Subpart iv, Chapter 1, Section C
